Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:41: Да, взимат за лъжа знанието, което не обхващат и още не е дошло при тях неговото тълкуване.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:42: Някои от тях вярват в него и някои от тях не вярват в него.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:43: И ако те взимат за лъжец, кажи: Моето дело е за мен, а вашето дело е за вас.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:44: Някои от тях се вслушват в теб, ала нима ти ще накараш глухите да чуят, ако не проумяват?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:45: И някои от тях гледат към теб, ала нима ще напътиш слепците, ако не съзират?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:46: Аллах не угнетява хората с нищо, а хората сами себе си угнетяват.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:47: В Деня, когато Той ще ги събере, сякаш са се забавили само един час от деня, те ще се познаят помежду си.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:48: И да ти покажем част от онова ,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:49: което им обещахме, или да те приберем, към Нас е тяхното завръщане.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:51: И казват: Кога [ще се сбъдне] това обещание, ако говорите истината?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:52: Кажи: Нито мога да навредя, нито да си помогна, освен ако Аллах пожелае.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:53: Кажи: Какво мислите, ако Неговото мъчение дойде при вас нощем или денем? Какво ще ускорят от него престъпниците?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:54: Нима после, когато се случи, ще повярвате в Него? [Тогава ще ви се каже:] Сега ли? А искахте да го ускорите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:55: После ще се каже на угнетителите: Вкусете вечното мъчение! Нима ще ви се въздаде за друго освен за онова, което сте придобили?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:56: Искат да ги известиш истина ли е това.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:57: И ако всеки, който е угнетител, притежаваше всичко на земята, щеше да се откупва с него.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:58: Да, на Аллах е всичко на небесата и на земята.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:59: Той съживява и Той умъртвява, и при Него ще бъдете върнати.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:60: О, хора, при вас дойде поучение от вашия Господ и изцеление на онова, което е в гърдите, и напътствие, и милосърдие за вярващите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:61: Кажи: С благодатта на Аллах и с Неговото милосърдие, с това нека ликуват! То е по-добро от това, което трупат.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:62: Кажи: Виждате ли какво препитание ви низпосла Аллах, а сторихте от него възбранено и позволено? Кажи: Аллах ли ви позволи, или за Аллах измисляте?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:63: И какво предполагат за Деня на възкресението онези, които измислят лъжа за Аллах? Аллах е владетел на благодат за хората, ала повечето от тях са непризнателни.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:64: С каквото и да се заемеш, и да четеш за него от Корана, и каквато и работа да вършите, над вас Ние сме свидетели, още щом навлезете в него.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:65: Да, за приближените на Аллах не ще има страх и не ще скърбят.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:67: за тях е радостната вест в земния живот и в отвъдния.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:68: И да не те натъжават думите им! Мощта принадлежи всецяло на Аллах.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:69: Да, на Аллах са всички на небесата и всички на земята.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:70: Той е, Който стори за вас нощта, за да почивате в нея, и деня - светъл.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:72: Кажи: Които измислят лъжа за Аллах, те не ще сполучат.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:73: Някаква наслада имат в земния живот, после към Нас е завръщането им, после ще ги накараме да вкусят суровото мъчение заради тяхното неверие.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:74: И им прочети вестта за Нух! Когато каза на своя народ: О, народе мой, ако ви тежат моят престой и моето напомняне за знаменията на Аллах, то на Аллах аз се уповавам.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:75: И да се отвърнете, аз не съм търсил отплата от вас.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:76: И го взеха за лъжец, и спасихме него и онези, които бяха с него в Ковчега, и ги сторихме наследници.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:77: После изпратихме подир него пратеници при техните народи и дойдоха при тях с ясните знаци, но не искаха да повярват в онова, което преди взимаха за лъжа.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:78: После изпратихме подир тях Муса и Харун с Нашите знамения при Фараона и знатните му хора, но се възгордяха и бяха престъпни хора.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:79: И когато дойде при тях истината от Нас, казаха: Това е явна магия.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:80: Муса каза: Нима така говорите за истината, когато тя дойде при вас? Нима е магия? Не ще сполучат магьосниците.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:81: Казаха: Нима дойде при нас, за да ни отлъчиш от онова, с което заварихме предците си, и да е за двама ви [о, Муса и Харун] величието по земята? Не ви вярваме.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:82: И каза Фараонът: Доведете ми всички знаещи магьосници!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:83: И когато магьосниците дойдоха, Муса им каза: Мятайте, каквото ще мятате!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:84: И когато метнаха, Муса каза: Магията е това, което вие донесохте.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:85: И утвърждава Аллах истината със Своите Слова, дори престъпниците да възненавиждат това.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:86: Но поради страх от мъчението на Фараона и знатните му хора, на Муса повярваха само малцина от неговия народ.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:87: И каза Муса: О, народе мой, щом вярвате в Аллах, на Него се уповавайте, ако сте отдадени Нему!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:89: И спаси ни със Своето милосърдие от невярващите хора!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:90: И повелихме на Муса и брат му: Вземете домове за своя народ в Египет и сторете домовете си места за поклонение, и отслужвайте молитвата - и благовествай вярващите!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:91: И каза Муса: Господи наш, Ти даде на Фараона и на знатните му хора украса и имоти в земния живот.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:92: Каза: Откликна се вече на вашия зов.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:93: И преведохме синовете на Исраил през морето, а Фараонът и войските му ги преследваха с гнет и вражда.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:94: Сега ли? А се възпротиви ти преди и бе от сеещите развала.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:95: Днес спасяваме твоето тяло, за да бъдеш знамение за онези след теб.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:96: И настанихме синовете на Исраил в обител на правдата, и им дадохме препитание от благините.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:97: И ако се съмняваш в онова, което ти низпослахме [о, Мухаммад], питай четящите Писанието преди теб! При теб вече дойде истината от твоя Господ.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:98: И не бъди от онези, които взимат за лъжа знаменията на Аллах, за да не бъдеш от губещите!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:99: Онези, спрямо които се потвърди словото на твоя Господ, не ще повярват,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:100: дори при тях да дойде всякакво знамение, докато не видят болезненото мъчение.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:101: Нима имаше друго селище, което да е повярвало и да му е донесла полза неговата вяра, освен народа на Юнус? Щом повярваха, снехме от тях позорното мъчение в земния живот и им дадохме да се наслаждават до време.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:102: И ако твоят Господ пожелаеше, на земята щяха да повярват всички до един.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:103: Никой не ще повярва иначе освен с позволението на Аллах.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:104: Кажи: Погледнете какво има на небесата и на земята! Но знаменията и предупредителите не ще избавят хора невярващи.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:105: Нима очакват дни, различни от тези на отминалите преди тях? Кажи: Чакайте! И аз чакам с вас.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:106: После спасяваме Нашите пратеници и онези, които са повярвали.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:107: Кажи [о, Мухаммад]: О, хора, ако се съмнявате в моята религия, то аз не ще служа на онези, на които вие служите вместо на Аллах, а ще служа на Аллах, Който ви прибира душите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:108: И обърни лице към религията правоверен, и никога не бъди от съдружаващите!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:109: И не зови вместо Аллах онова, което нито ти помага, нито ти вреди! А сториш ли го, тогава наистина си от угнетителите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:110: И ако Аллах те засегне с вреда, не ще я отмени друг освен Него.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:111: Кажи: О, хора, вече дойде при вас истината от вашия Господ.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 10:112: И следвай, каквото ти се разкрива, и бъди търпелив, додето Аллах отсъди! Той е Най-добрият съдник.

null.verse 10:1: 艾列弗，倆目，拉儀。這些是包含智慧的經典的節文。
null.verse 10:2: 難道人們認為這是怪事嗎？我曾啟示他們中的一個男子：你要警告眾人，你要向信士們報喜，告訴他們在他們的主那裡，他們有崇高的品位。不信道者曾說：「這確是明顯的術士。」
null.verse 10:3: 你們的主確是真主，他曾在六日內創造了天地，然後升上寶座，處理萬事。沒有一個說情者，不是先得到他的允許的。那是真主，你們的主，你們應當崇拜他。你們怎麼還不覺悟呢？
null.verse 10:4: 你們都只歸於他，真主的諾言是真實的。他確已創造了萬物，而且必加以再造，以便他秉公地報酬信道而且行善者。不信道者，將因自己的不信道而飲沸水，並受痛苦的刑罰。
null.verse 10:5: 他曾以太陽為發光的、以月亮為光明的，並為月亮而定列宿，以便你們知道歷算。真主只依真理而創造之。他為能了解的民眾而解釋一切蹟象。
null.verse 10:6: 晝夜的輪流，以及真主在天地間所造的森羅萬象，在克己的民眾看來，此中確有釵h蹟象。
null.verse 10:7: 不希望與我相會，只願永享今世生活，而且安然享受的人，以及忽視我的種種蹟象的人，
null.verse 10:8: 他們將因自己的營謀而以火獄為歸宿。
null.verse 10:9: 信道而且行善的人，他們的主將因他們的信仰而引導他們；他們將安居於下臨諸河的幸福園中。
null.verse 10:10: 他們在樂園中的祈禱是：「我們的主啊！我們讚美你。」他們在樂園中祝辭是：「平安。」他們最後的祈禱是：「一切讚頌，全歸真主——全世界的主。」
null.verse 10:11: 假若真主為世人速降災害，猶如他們急於求福那樣，他們的大限必已判定了。但我任隨那些不希望與我相會的人徘徊於其殘暴之中。
null.verse 10:12: 當人遭遇災害的時候，便臥著、或坐著、或站著向我祈禱。等我解除他們的災害後，他們就繼續作惡，彷彿不曾祈求我解除他們的災害一樣。過份的人們是這樣為他們的行為所迷惑的。
null.verse 10:13: 在你們之前曾有許多世代，他們族中的使者既昭示了他們許多明証，而他們仍行不義，不肯信道，我就毀滅了他們，我這樣報應犯罪的民眾。
null.verse 10:14: 在他們滅亡之後，我以你們成為大地上的代治者，以便我看你們怎樣工作。
null.verse 10:15: 有人對他們宣讀我的明顯的蹟象的時候，那些不希望會見我的人說：「請你另拿一部《古蘭經》來，或者請你修改這部《古蘭經》。」你說：「我不至於擅自修改它。我只能遵從我所受的啟示。如果我違抗我的主，我的確畏懼重大日的刑罰。」
null.verse 10:16: 你說：「假若真主意欲，我一定不向你們宣讀這部經，真主也不使你們了解其意義。在降示這部經之前，我確已在你們中間度過了大半生了，難道你們不明理嗎？」
null.verse 10:17: 假借真主的名義而造謠，或否認其蹟象的人，有誰比他還不義呢？犯罪的人一定不會成功。
null.verse 10:18: 除真主外，他們崇拜那對他們既無福又無禍的東西，他們說：「這些（偶像）是在真主那裡替我們說情的。」你說：「難道真主不知道天地間有此事，而要你們來告訴他嗎！讚美真主，他超乎萬物！他超乎他們在他之外所崇拜的東西！」
null.verse 10:19: 人們原來是一個民族，嗣後，他們信仰分歧，假若沒有一句話，從你主預先發出，那末他們所爭論的是非，必定獲得判決了。
null.verse 10:20: 他們說：「為何沒有一種蹟象從他的主降臨他呢？」你說：「幽玄只歸真主，你們期待著吧！我確是和你們在一起期待著的！」
null.verse 10:21: 在眾人遭遇災害之後，當我使他們嘗試慈恩的時候，他們忽然圖謀誹謗我的蹟象。你說：「真主的計謀是更迅速的。」我的使者們確是記錄你們的計謀的。
null.verse 10:22: 真主使你們在陸上和海上旅行。當你們坐在船中，乘順風而航行，並因風而欣喜的時候，暴風向船襲來，波濤從各處滾來，船裡的人猜想自己已被包圍，他們虔誠地祈禱真主，「如果你使我們脫離這次災難，我們必定感謝你。」
null.verse 10:23: 當他拯救了他們的時候，他們忽然在地方上無理地侵害（他人）。人們啊！你們的侵害只有害於自身，那是今世生活的享受，然後，你們只歸於我，我要把你們的行為告訴你們。
null.verse 10:24: 今世的生活，就像是從雲中降下雨水，地裡的禾苗，即人和牲畜所吃的東西——就因之而繁茂起來。直到田地穿上盛裝，打扮得很美麗，而農夫猜想自己可以獲得豐收的時候，我的命令在黑夜或白晝降臨那些田地，我使五穀只留下茬兒，彷彿新近沒有種過莊稼一樣。我為能思維的民眾這樣解釋許多蹟象。
null.verse 10:25: 真主召人到平安的住宅，並引導其所欲引導的人走上正路。
null.verse 10:26: 行善者將受善報，且有餘慶，臉上沒有黑灰和憂色，這些人是樂園的居民，將永居其中。
null.verse 10:27: 作惡者每作一惡，必受同樣的惡報，而且臉上有憂色——沒有任何人能幫助他們對抗真主——他們的臉上彷彿有黑夜的顏色。這些人是火獄的居民，將永居其中。
null.verse 10:28: 在那日，我要把他們全部集合起來，然後，對以物配主的人說：「你們和你們的配主站住吧！」於是，我使他們彼此分離，他們的配主要說：「你們沒有崇拜過我們，
null.verse 10:29: 真主足為我們和你們之間的見証，我們的確忽視你們的崇拜。」
null.verse 10:30: 在那時，各人將考驗自己在生前的行為，他們將被送到真主——他們真實的保護者那裡去，而他們所捏造的已回避他們了。
null.verse 10:31: 你說：「誰從天上和地上給你們提供給養？誰主持你們的聽覺和視覺？誰使活物從死物中生出？誰使死物從活物中生出？誰管理事物？」他們要說：「真主。」你說：「難道你們不敬畏他嗎？
null.verse 10:32: 那是真主，你們的真實的主宰。在真理之外，除了迷誤還有甚麼呢？你們怎麼顛倒是非呢？」
null.verse 10:33: 你的主的判決對放肆的人們落實了。他們畢竟是不信道的。
null.verse 10:34: 你說：「你們的配主，有能創造萬物，而且加以再造的嗎？」你說：「真主能創造萬物，而且能加以再造。你們怎麼混淆黑白呢？」
null.verse 10:35: 你說：「你們的配主有能導人於真理的嗎？」你說：「真主能導人於真理。是能導人於真理的更宜於受人順從呢？還是須受引導才能遵循正道的，更宜於受人順從呢？你們怎麼啦？你們怎麼這樣判斷呢？」
null.verse 10:36: 他們大半是只憑猜想，猜想對於真理是毫無裨益的。真主確是全知他們的行為的。
null.verse 10:37: 這部《古蘭經》不是可以捨真主而偽造的，卻是真主降示來証實以前的天經，並詳述真主所制定的律例的。其中毫無疑義，乃是從全世界的主所降示的。
null.verse 10:38: 難道他們說他偽造經典嗎？你說：「你們就試擬作一章吧！」如果你們是誠實的，你們就應當捨真主而籲請你們所能籲請的人。
null.verse 10:39: 不！他們否認他們所未通曉，而其解釋尚未降臨的經典。在他們之前的人，曾這樣把他們族中的使者稱為說謊者。你看看！不義者的結局，是怎樣的！
null.verse 10:40: 他們中有信它的，有不信它的。你的主是知道作惡者的。
null.verse 10:41: 如果他們稱你為說謊者，你就說：「我有我的工作，你們有你們的工作，你們與我所做的事無干，我與你們所做的事無涉。」
null.verse 10:42: 他們中有傾聽你的，難道你能使聾子聞道嗎？如果他們是不明理的。
null.verse 10:43: 他們中有注視你的，難道你能引導瞎子嗎？即使他們沒有洞察力。
null.verse 10:44: 真主的確毫不虧待人們，但人們卻虧待自己。
null.verse 10:45: 在他集合他們的那日，他們彷彿只在白晝逗留過一會兒，他們互相認識，把與真主相會之說稱為謊言的人，確已虧折了，他們不是遵循正道的。
null.verse 10:46: 如果我昭示你一點我所用以恫嚇他們的那種刑罰，那末，我對他們確是全能的；設或我使你壽終，那末，他們只歸於我，然後，真主是見証他們的行為的。
null.verse 10:47: 每個民族各有一個使者。當他們族中的使者來臨的時候，他們要被秉公判決，不受冤枉。
null.verse 10:48: 他們說：「這個警告甚麼時候實現呢？如果你們是誠實的人。」
null.verse 10:49: 你說：「我不能為我自己主持禍福，除非真主意欲，每個民族各有一個期限，當他們的期限來臨的時候，他們不能耽延一會兒；（當其未來臨的時候，）他們不能提前的一會兒。」
null.verse 10:50: 你說：「你們告訴我吧！如果他的刑罰，在黑夜或白晝來臨你們，那末，犯罪的人們要求早日實現的是甚麼刑罰呢？
null.verse 10:51: 難道要他們的刑罰降臨你們的時候，你們才歸依他嗎？」你們確要求他的刑罰早日降臨你們，現在，你們（卻歸依他）嗎？
null.verse 10:52: 然後，有人要對不義的人們說：「你們嘗試永久的刑罰吧！你們只因自己的謀求而受報酬。」
null.verse 10:53: 他們問你：「這是真實的嗎？」你說：「是的，指我的主發誓，這確是真實的，你們絕不能逃避天譴。」
null.verse 10:54: 假若每個不義的人，都擁有大地上的一切，他必用它做罰金。當他們看見刑罰的時候，他們必懷悔恨。他們要被秉公判決，不受冤枉。
null.verse 10:55: 真的，天地萬物確是真主的。真的，真主的諾言，確是真實的；但他們大半不知道。
null.verse 10:56: 他能使死者生，能使生者死；你們只被召歸於他。
null.verse 10:57: 人們啊！確已降臨你們的，是從你們的主發出的教誨，是治心病的良藥，是對信士們的引導和慈恩。
null.verse 10:58: 你說：「這是由於真主的恩惠和慈恩，叫他們因此而高興吧！這比他們所聚積的還要好。」
null.verse 10:59: 你說：「你們告訴我吧！真主為你們降下的給養，你們把它分為違法的與合法的，你們究竟是奉真主的命令呢？還是假借真主的名義而造謠呢？」
null.verse 10:60: 假借真主的名義而造謠的人們在復活日將作何猜想呢？真主對人們，確是有恩惠的，但他們大半不感謝。
null.verse 10:61: 無論你處理甚麼事物，無論你誦讀《古蘭經》哪一章經文，無論你們做甚麼工作，當你們著手的時候，我總是見証你們的。天地間微塵重的事物，都不能逃避真主的鑒察，無論比微塵小還是比微塵大，都記載在一本明顯的天經中。
null.verse 10:62: 真的，真主的朋友們，將來沒有恐懼，也不憂愁。
null.verse 10:63: 他們就是信道而敬畏的人。
null.verse 10:64: 在今世和後世，他們都將得到佳音。真主的諾言是毫厘不爽的。那確是偉大的成功。
null.verse 10:65: 你不要讓他們的胡言亂語而使你憂愁；一切權勢歸真主，他確是全聰的，全知的。
null.verse 10:66: 真的，天地間的一切，確是真主的，捨真主而祈禱許多配主的人，究竟憑甚麼呢？他們只憑臆測，他們盡說謊話。
null.verse 10:67: 他為你們創造了黑夜，以便你們在夜間安息；又創造白晝，以便你們在白天能看見東西。對於能聽忠言的民眾，此中確有許多蹟象。
null.verse 10:68: 他們說：「真主以人為子。」光榮歸於真主！他是無求的。天地萬物都是他的。你們對此事並無明証，難道你們可以假借真主的名義而妄說出自己所不知道的事情嗎？
null.verse 10:69: 你說：「假借真主的名義而造謠的人是不會成功的。」
null.verse 10:70: 這只是今世的享受，然後他們只歸於我，然後我將因他們不信道而使他們嘗試嚴厲的刑罰。
null.verse 10:71: 你當對他們宣讀努哈的故事，當時他對他的宗族說：「我的宗族啊！如果我居住在你們中間，以真主的蹟象教訓你們，這使你們感到難堪，那末，我只信托真主，你們應當和你們的配主在一起決定你們的事情，不要讓你們的事情成為暖昧的。你們對我做出判決吧，不要寬限我。
null.verse 10:72: 如果你們違背我的教誨，那末，我未曾向你們索取任何報酬；我的報酬只歸真主負擔。我曾奉命做－個順服的人。」
null.verse 10:73: 但他們稱他為說謊者，故我拯救了他和與他同船的人，並使他們為代治者，而淹死了否認我的蹟象的人。你看看曾被警告者的結局是怎樣的！
null.verse 10:74: 在他之後，我曾派遣許多使者，去教化他們自己的宗族。他們曾用許多明証昭示他們，但他們不會相信自己以前所否認的東西。我這樣封閉過份者的心。
null.verse 10:75: 在他們之後，我曾派遣穆薩和哈倫帶著我的許多蹟象，去教化法老和他的顯貴，但他們自大，他們是犯罪的民眾。
null.verse 10:76: 當從我這兒發出的真理降臨他們的時候，他們說：「這確是明顯的魔術。」
null.verse 10:77: 穆薩說：「難道你們這樣評論已降臨你們的真理嗎？這難道是魔術嗎？術士是不會成功的。」
null.verse 10:78: 他們說：「你到我們這裡來，想使我們拋奔我們的祖先的宗教，而讓你們倆稱尊於國中嗎？我們絕不會歸信你們的。」
null.verse 10:79: 法老說：「你們把一切高明的術士都召來見我吧！」
null.verse 10:80: 當術士們來到的時候，穆薩對他們說：「你們要拋出甚麼就快拋出來吧！」
null.verse 10:81: 當他們拋出來的時候，穆薩說：「你們所表演的確是魔術，真主必使它無效，真主必定不相助破壞者的工作。」
null.verse 10:82: 真主將以他的言語証實真理，即使犯罪的人不願意。
null.verse 10:83: 歸信穆薩的只有他本族的苗裔；他們害怕法老和他們本族頭目們迫害他們。法老在地方上確是高傲的，確是過份的。
null.verse 10:84: 穆薩說：「我的宗族啊！如果你們信仰真主，你們就應當只信賴他，如果你們是歸順的。」
null.verse 10:85: 他們說：「我們只信賴真主。我們的主啊！求你不要讓不義的民眾迫害我們。
null.verse 10:86: 求你以你的慈恩而使我們脫離不信道的民眾。」
null.verse 10:87: 我曾啟示穆薩和他哥哥說：「你們倆當為自己的宗族而在埃及建造些房屋，你們應當以自己的房屋為禮拜的地方，你們應當謹守拜功，你應當向信士們報喜。」
null.verse 10:88: 穆薩說：「我們的主啊！你把各種裝飾品和今世生活的各種財產給予法老和他的貴族們——我們的主啊！——以致他們使民眾背離你的大道。我們的主啊！求你毀掉他們的財產，求你封閉他們的心。但願他們不信道，直到看見痛苦的刑罰。」
null.verse 10:89: 主說：「你們倆的祈禱確已被應承了，故你們倆應當繼續傳道，你們倆不要遵循無知者的道路。」
null.verse 10:90: 我曾使以色列人渡海，於是法老和他的軍隊殘暴地追趕他們，直到他將被淹死的時候，他才說：「我確信，除以色列人所歸信者外，絕無應受崇拜的；同時，我是一個順服者。」
null.verse 10:91: 現在（你才歸信）嗎？以前你確已違抗命令，而且是一個破壞的人。
null.verse 10:92: 但今日我拯救你的遺體，以便你做後來者的鑒戒。多數的人，對於我的鑒戒，確是忽視的。
null.verse 10:93: 我確已使以色列人居住在一個安定的地方，並以佳美的食物供給他們。他們的意見沒有分歧，直到那種知識降臨他們。復活日，你的主必將判決他們所爭論的是非。
null.verse 10:94: 假若你懷疑我所降示你的經典，你就問問那些常常誦讀在你之前所降示的天經的人們。從你的主發出的真理，確已降臨你，故你切莫居於懷疑者的行列，
null.verse 10:95: 切莫居於否認真主的蹟象者的行列，以致你入於虧折者之中。
null.verse 10:96: 被你的主的判詞所判決的人，必定不信道；
null.verse 10:97: 即使每種蹟象都降臨他們，直到他們看見痛苦的刑罰。
null.verse 10:98: 為何沒有一個城市的居民信仰正道，因而獲得信道的裨益呢？但優努斯的宗族，當他們信道的時候，我曾為他們解除了今世生活中凌辱的刑罰，並使他們暫時享受。
null.verse 10:99: 如果你的主意欲，大地上所有的人，必定都信道了。難道你要強迫眾人都做信士嗎？
null.verse 10:100: 任何人都不會信道，除非奉真主的命令。他以刑罰加於不明理的人們。
null.verse 10:101: 你說：「你們要觀察天地之間的森羅萬象。一切蹟象和警告者，對於不信道的民眾是毫無裨益的。
null.verse 10:102: 他們只等待在他們之前逝去者所遭的那種苦難日子。」你說：「你們等待吧！我確是與你們一起等待的。」
null.verse 10:103: 嗣後，我拯救了我的使者們和信道的人們，我將這樣負責拯救一般信士。
null.verse 10:104: 你說：「人們啊！如果你們懷疑我的宗教，那末，我不崇拜你們捨真主而崇拜的，但我崇拜真主，他將使你們壽終。我奉命做一個信道者，
null.verse 10:105: 並（奉命說）：「你應當趨向正教，你切莫做一個以物配主的人，
null.verse 10:106: 切莫捨真主而祈禱那對於你既無福又無禍的東西。假若你那祥做，你就必定是一個不義的人。
null.verse 10:107: 如果真主降一點災害於你，那末，除他之外，絕無能解除災害的。如果他欲降福利於你，那末，任何人也不能阻攔他的恩惠。他把那恩惠降於他所意欲的僕人。他是至赦的，是至慈的。」
null.verse 10:108: 你說：「眾人呀！從你們的主發出的真理，確已降臨你們。誰遵循正道，誰自受其益；誰誤入歧途，誰自受其害，我不是監護你們的。」
null.verse 10:109: 你應當遵從你所受的啟示，並應當堅忍，直到真主判決，他是最公正的判決者。 你說：「眾人呀！從你們的主發出的真理，確已降臨你們。誰遵循正道，誰自受其益；誰誤入歧途，誰自受其害，我不是監護你們的。」

null.verse 10:1: Alif lám rá! Toto jsou znamení Písma moudrého!
null.verse 10:2: Je snad lidem podivné, že jsme vnukli muži jednomu z nich: "Varuj lidi a oznam zvěst radostnou těm, kdož uvěřili, že u Pána svého budou mít spravedlivé postavení.
null.verse 10:3: Pánem vaším je věru Bůh, jenž stvořil nebesa a zemi v šesti dnech a potom se na trůnu usadil, aby věci všechny řídil.
null.verse 10:4: K Němu se uskuteční návrat váš, a to slib Boží je pravdivý! On zahájil první stvoření a potom je bude opakovat, aby spravedlivě odměnil ty, kdož uvěřili a zbožné skutky konali; pro ty, kdož nevěřícími byli, pak připraven je nápoj vroucí a trest bolestný za to, že nevěřili.
null.verse 10:5: On je ten, kdo slunce jasnou září učinil a měsíc světlem a postavení jeho určil, abyste počet roků i počítání jejich znali.
null.verse 10:6: A zajisté jsou ve střídání noci a dne i ve všem, co Bůh na nebesích a na zemi stvořil, znamení pro lid bohabojný.
null.verse 10:7: Věru ti, kdož v setkání s Námi nedoufají a v životě pozemském zalíbení nalézají a jen jím se spokojují, a ti, kteří ke znamením Našim jsou lhostejní,
null.verse 10:8: ti za to, co si vysloužili, útočiště své budou mít v ohni.
null.verse 10:9: Ty pak, kdož uvěřili a zbožné skutky konali, ty povede Pán jejich ve víře jejich a pod nimi potekou řeky v zahradách blaženosti,
null.verse 10:10: v nichž voláním jejich bude: "Sláva Tobě, Bože veliký!" a přivítáním pozdrav: "Mír s vámi!" a koncem zvolání jejich: "Chvála Bohu, Pánu lidstva veškerého!"
null.verse 10:11: Kdyby Bůh uspíšil lidem neštěstí, tak jak oni si přejí uspíšit pro sebe dobro, byla by již lhůta jejich rozhodnuta.
null.verse 10:12: Když postihne člověka neštěstí, tu volá Nás vleže, vsedě i vestoje, když však od něho neštěstí odejmeme, kráčí dále, jako by Nás nebyl nikdy volal proti neštěstí, jež se ho dotklo.
null.verse 10:13: A zahubili jsme již před vámi pokolení předchozí, když lidé nespravedliví byli a při příchodu poslů svých s důkazy jasnými jim neuvěřili.
null.verse 10:14: Potom jsme vás učinili nástupci jejich na zemi po záhubě jejich, abychom zjistili, jak počínat si budete.
null.verse 10:15: A když jsou jim přednášena znamení Naše jako důkazy, ti, kdož v setkání s Námi nedoufají, říkají: "Přines nám Korán jiný než tento, anebo v něm proveď změny!" Odpověz: "Nepřísluší mi, abych sám o sobě jej měnil, já pouze následuji to, co bylo mi vnuknuto, a bojím se, neuposlechnu-li Pána svého, trestu dne strašného.
null.verse 10:16: Rci: "Kdyby Bůh chtěl, nebyl bych vám sdělil tento Korán a nebyl by vám dal o něm vědění.
null.verse 10:17: Kdo je nespravedlivější než ten, kdo proti Bohu si lži vymýšlí či znamení Jeho za lživá prohlašuje? Věru že hříšníci se nestanou blaženými.
null.verse 10:18: Oni uctívají místo Boha něco, co jim nemůže ani škodit, ani prospívat; a říkají: "Toto jsou přímluvci naši u Boha!" Rci: "Chcete poučovat Boha o něčem, co by neznal na nebesích a na zemi? Sláva Mu, oč vznešenější je On než to, co k Němu přidružujete!"
null.verse 10:19: Lidé původně jen národ jediný tvořili, avšak pak se v názorech rozešli.
null.verse 10:20: Říkají: "Pročpak mu nebylo sesláno od Pána jeho znamení nějaké?" Odpověz: "Nepoznatelné jedině Bohu přísluší.
null.verse 10:21: Když jsme dali lidem okusit milosrdenství Svého poté, co dotklo se jich neštěstí, hle, oni úklady strojí proti znamením Našim.
null.verse 10:22: A On je ten, jenž cestovat vám dává po souši i po moři, a když jste na lodi.
null.verse 10:23: A když je zachrání, hle, znovu páší nepravosti na zemi bezprávně: "Ó lidé, nepravosti vaše se proti vám samým obrátí, vždyť krátké je užívání života pozemského a potom k Nám se uskuteční váš návrat a My vás poučíme o tom, co jste páchali!"
null.verse 10:24: Život pozemský se věru podobá vodě, kterou jsme seslali z nebe: mísí se s rostlinstvem země, jímž lidé a zvířata se živí.
null.verse 10:25: A Bůh zve lidi do příbytku míru a vede po stezce přímé, koho chce.
null.verse 10:26: Těm, kdo dobré konali, bude patřit odměna nejkrásnější a ještě jim bude přidáno; jich tváře nepokryje ani chmura, ani ponížení a budou ráje obyvateli a v něm věčné bude jejich přebývání.
null.verse 10:27: Těm, kdož špatných skutků se dopustili, dostane se odměny podobně zlé a budou pokryti ponížením.
null.verse 10:28: V den, kdy shromáždíme všechny, řekneme těm, kdož modloslužebníky byli: "Na místa svá, vy i ti, jež jste přidružovali!" A až je rozdělíme od sebe, řeknou ti, které oni k Bohu přidružovali: "Věru jste nás neuctívali
null.verse 10:29: a Bůh stačí jako svědek mezi námi i vámi, že my dozajista jsme byli nevšímaví k vašemu uctívání!"
null.verse 10:30: A tam zakusí duše každá za to, co již dříve konala.
null.verse 10:31: Rci: "Kdo uštědřuje vám obživu z nebes a země? Kdo vládcem je sluchu a zraku? Kdo dává vzejít živému z mrtvého a mrtvému ze živého a kdo řídí rozkazy všechny?" I odvětí: "Bůh!" Rci jim tedy: "Proč tedy nechcete být bohabojní?"
null.verse 10:32: Hle, takový je Bůh, Pán váš i pravda! A co zůstane jiného, odejde-li pravda, než bloudění? Kam jste se to jen obrátili?
null.verse 10:33: A takto se uskutečňuje slovo Pána tvého nad těmi, kdož nestoudní jsou - že totiž neuvěří!
null.verse 10:34: Rci: "Je mezi těmi, jež k Bohu přidružujete, někdo, kdo zahájil první stvoření a potom je opakuje?" A dodej: "Jedině Bůh zahajuje první stvoření a potom je opakuje! Jak jen můžete tak lhát?"
null.verse 10:35: Rci: "Je mezi těmi, jež k Bohu přidružujete, někdo, kdo vede k pravdě?" A dodej: "Jedině Bůh vede k pravdě! Zdaž ten, jenž k pravdě vede, je více hoden následování, anebo ten, kdo nevede, byť i byl sám veden? Co je tedy s vámi, že takto usuzujete?"
null.verse 10:36: Většina z nich jen domněnky následuje a domněnky nic nezmohou proti pravdě! Však Bůh dobře zná, co dělají.
null.verse 10:37: Tento Korán nemohl být vymyšlen nikým kromě Boha; a byl seslán, aby potvrdil pravdivost dřívějších zjevení a aby objasnil Písmo, o němž pochyby není a jež od Pána lidstva veškerého přichází.
null.verse 10:38: Anebo jestliže říkají: "On si to vymyslil," odpověz: "Přineste súru podobnou této a zavolejte si na pomoc, koho můžete, kromě Boha, jste-li pravdomluvní!"
null.verse 10:39: Avšak oni naopak za lživé prohlašují to, co věděním svým obsáhnout nemohou a k čemu se jim ještě výkladu nedostalo.
null.verse 10:40: A mezi nimi jsou někteří, kdož v ně věří, zatímco jiní mezi nimi v ně vůbec nevěří.
null.verse 10:41: A jestliže tě lhářem nazývají, řekni jim: "Já mám své skutky a vy máte své skutky, vy nejste zodpovědní za činy mé a já nejsem zodpovědný za činy vaše.
null.verse 10:42: A mezi nimi jsou někteří, kdož ti naslouchají; můžeš však způsobit, aby slyšeli hluší, když k tomu ještě nechápou?
null.verse 10:43: A jsou mezi nimi někteří, kteří se na tebe dívají; můžeš však vést slepé, když nevidí?
null.verse 10:44: Bůh v ničem neukřivdí lidem, leč lidé věru sami sobě křivdí.
null.verse 10:45: A v den, kdy Bůh je shromáždí, bude jim připadat, jako by nestrávili v hrobech ani hodinu jednu ze dne, a poznají se vzájemně.
null.verse 10:46: Buď ti ukážeme část z toho, čím jsme jim pohrozili, anebo tě k Sobě povoláme dříve; k Nám pak se uskuteční návrat všech a Bůh bude svědčit o tom, co dělali.
null.verse 10:47: A národ každý má posla svého; jakmile pak přijde k nim posel jejich, bude mezi nimi spravedlivě rozhodnuto a nebude jim ukřivděno.
null.verse 10:48: A ptají se: "Kdy splní se hrozba tato, jste-li pravdomluvní?"
null.verse 10:49: Odpověz: "Není v moci mé způsobit si škodu či užitek, leda bude-li Bůh chtít.
null.verse 10:50: Rci: "Domníváte se, že až se k vám dostaví trest Jeho v noci či za dne, že hříšníci si budou přát jeho uspíšení?
null.verse 10:51: Uvěříte v něj až tehdy, kdy na vás dopadne? Nyní v něj věřte, když jste si přáli jeho uspíšení!"
null.verse 10:52: A bude řečeno těm, kdož nespravedliví byli: "Okuste trestu věčného! Což odměňováni jste za něco jiného než za to, co sami jste si vysloužili?"
null.verse 10:53: A vyptávají se tě, zda je to pravda.
null.verse 10:54: A kdyby každá duše nespravedlivá měla vše, co je na zemi, chtěla by se tím vykoupit.
null.verse 10:55: Což Bohu nepatří vše, co na nebesích je a na zemi? Což není slib Boží pravdivý? A přece většina z nich to neví.
null.verse 10:56: On život i smrt dává a k Němu budete navráceni.
null.verse 10:57: Ó lidé, nyní vám přišlo od Pána vašeho varování a uzdravení toho, co v hrudích je skryto, i správné vedení a milosrdenství pro věřící.
null.verse 10:58: Rci: "Nechť radují se z dobrodiní a milosrdenství Božího a z toho všeho a to lepší je než to, co shromažďují.
null.verse 10:59: Zeptej se: "Co soudíte? Z toho, co Bůh seslal jako obživu, jste si učinili věci dovolené a zakázané.
null.verse 10:60: A co si budou myslit v den zmrtvýchvstání ti, kdož proti Bohu lži si vymýšleli? Bůh zajisté je pln laskavosti vůči lidem, ale většina z nich jsou nevděčníci.
null.verse 10:61: A ať v jakémkoliv budeš postavení a ať cokoliv budeš z Koránu čísti a ať cokoliv budete z činů dělat, My svědky vašimi budeme, když to budete podnikat a neunikne Pánu tvému ani váha zrnka prachu na zemi a na nebi, ba ani nic menšího či většího - aniž by to bylo zapsáno v Písmu zjevném.
null.verse 10:62: Nikoliv, přátelé Boží věru nemusí mít strach žádný, a nebudou zarmouceni
null.verse 10:63: ti, kdož uvěřili a byli bohabojní.
null.verse 10:64: Pro takové platí zvěst radostná v životě pozemském i budoucím.
null.verse 10:65: Nechť tě nermoutí řeči nevěřících, vždyť moc veškerá Bohu náleží a On slyšící je i vševědoucí.
null.verse 10:66: Což Bohu nepatří vše, co na nebesích je i na zemi? Co tedy vlastně následují ti, kdož místo Boha "přidružené" vzývají? Domněnky své jen následují a pouze předpokládají.
null.verse 10:67: On je ten, kdo pro vás noc stvořil, abyste v ní odpočívali, a den, abyste v něm zřetelně viděli.
null.verse 10:68: Říkají: "Bůh si vzal děti.
null.verse 10:69: Rci: "Ti, kdož si o Bohu lži vymýšlejí, nebudou mezi blaženými.
null.verse 10:70: Krátké bude jejich života pozemského užívání; k Nám pak se jejich návrat uskuteční a nakonec jim dáme okusit trestu strašného za to, že byli nevěřící.
null.verse 10:71: Přednes jim zvěst o Noemovi, když řekl lidu svému: "Lide můj, jestliže je vám nepříjemný můj pobyt mezi vámi a mé připomínky znamení Božích, pak já spoléhám na Boha.
null.verse 10:72: Obrátíte-li se zády.
null.verse 10:73: Oni však jej za lháře prohlásili a zachránili jsme jej i ty, kdož s ním na lodi byli, a učinili jsme je nástupci na zemi.
null.verse 10:74: Po něm jsme vyslali posly jiné k národům jejich a přišli k nim s důkazy jasnými, avšak lidé nebyli schopni uvěřit v to, co předtím za lež prohlásili.
null.verse 10:75: Po nich pak jsme vyslali Mojžíše a Áróna s Našimi znameními k Faraónovi a velmožům jeho, avšak ti pýchou se naduli a lidem hříšným byli.
null.verse 10:76: A když k nim přišla pravda od Nás vycházející, zvolali: "Toto je věru jen kouzelnictví zjevné!"
null.verse 10:77: Tu otázal se Mojžíš: "Jak můžete říkat toto o pravdě, jež k vám přišla? To že je kouzelnictví? Vždyť kouzelníci věru nebudou patřit mezi blažené!"
null.verse 10:78: Odpověděli: "Přišels k nám, abys nás odvrátil od toho, co u otců svých jsme nalezli, a aby vám oběma pak připadla moc nejvyšší v zemi? My nejsme z těch, kdo by vám uvěřili.
null.verse 10:79: Rozkázal pak Faraón: "Přiveďte mi všechny kouzelníky učené!"
null.verse 10:80: A když se kouzelníci dostavili, pravil jim Mojžíš: "Hoďte to, co hodit chcete!"
null.verse 10:81: A když hodili, zvolal Mojžíš: "To, co jste předvedli, je kouzelnictví pouhé, jež Bůh nicotným učiní, vždyť Bůh nedopřeje úspěchu dílu těch, kdož pohoršení šíří,
null.verse 10:82: ale Bůh uskutečňuje pravdu slovem Svým, i když se to hříšníkům nelíbí!"
null.verse 10:83: A neuvěřil Mojžíšovi nikdo kromě potomstva z vlastního lidu jeho z obavy, že Faraón a velmoži jeho je zkoušce podrobí, neboť Faraón vskutku mocný byl v této zemi a patřil k přestupníkům.
null.verse 10:84: I pravil Mojžíš: "Lide můj, věříte-li v Boha, spolehněte se na Něho, jestliže jste se již odevzdali do vůle Jeho.
null.verse 10:85: Odpověděli: "Spoléháme se na Boha; Pane náš, nevydávej nás zkouškám národa tyranského,
null.verse 10:86: ale zachraň nás z milosrdenství Svého před národem nevěřícím!"
null.verse 10:87: A vnukli jsme Mojžíšovi a bratru jeho: "Založte pro lid svůj v Egyptě příbytky a učiňte domy své qiblou a dodržujte modlitbu; a oznam věřícím zvěst radostnou!"
null.verse 10:88: Pravil Mojžíš: "Pane náš, Tys dal Faraónovi a velmožům jeho lesk a bohatství v životě pozemském, aby, Pane náš, sváděli z cesty Tvé.
null.verse 10:89: I odpověděl Bůh: "Vyslyšena je prosba vaše; kráčejte oba stezkou přímou a nenásledujte cestu těch, kdož nic nevědí!"
null.verse 10:90: A převedli jsme dítka Izraele přes moře, zatímco Faraón a vojska jeho je pronásledovali nespravedlivě a nenávistně.
null.verse 10:91: Avšak Bůh pravil: "Teprve nyní?! Ale předtím jsi byl vzpurný a patřils mezi ty, kdož pohoršení šíří.
null.verse 10:92: Však dnes tě zachráníme v těle tvém, abys byl znamením pro ty, kdož po tobě přijdou, vždyť věru většina z lidí je lhostejná ke znamením Našim.
null.verse 10:93: A usadili jsme dítka Izraele na místě spolehlivém a uštědřili jsme jim obživu výtečnou.
null.verse 10:94: Jsi-li na pochybách o tom, co jsme ti seslali, dotaž se těch, kdož Písmo před tebou seslané přednášejí.
null.verse 10:95: A nebuď též jedním z těch, kdož znamení Boží za lživá prohlásili, abys nebyl z těch, kdož ztrátu utrpěli.
null.verse 10:96: Ti, proti nimž se vyplnilo slovo Pána tvého, neuvěří,
null.verse 10:97: i kdyby se jim dostalo všech možných znamení, dokud trest bolestný nespatří.
null.verse 10:98: Bylo kdy město nějaké, které uvěřilo a jemuž pomohla víra jeho kromě lidu Jonášova? A když uvěřili, odvrátili jsme od nich v životě pozemském trest zahanbující a nechali jsme jim užívati ho po dobu určitou.
null.verse 10:99: Kdyby byl Pán tvůj chtěl, věru by byli všichni, kdož na zemi jsou, vesměs uvěřili.
null.verse 10:100: když není duši žádné dáno, aby uvěřila jinak než z dovolení Boha, a když On uvaluje hněv Svůj na ty, kteří rozum nemají?
null.verse 10:101: Rci: "Pohleďte na vše, co na nebesích a na zemi je!" Však co pomohou znamení či varováni lidem, kteří vůbec nevěří?
null.verse 10:102: Co jiného mohou očekávat, než dny podobné dnům těch, kdož před nimi již zanikli? Rci: "Čekejte tedy a já také spolu s vámi budu čekat!"
null.verse 10:103: My potom posly Své a ty, kdož uvěřili, zachráníme a je Naší povinností věřící zachraňovat.
null.verse 10:104: Rci: "Lidé, jste-li na pochybách stran náboženství mého, tedy vězte, že já neuctívám ty, které vy uctíváte místo Boha, nýbrž uctívám Boha, jenž k Sobě vás povolá; a bylo mi poručeno, abych byl jedním z věřících,
null.verse 10:105: a bylo mi řečeno: "Obrať tvář svou k náboženství pravému jako haníf a nebuď modloslužebníkem
null.verse 10:106: a nevzývej místo Boha to, co ani užitek, ani škodu způsobit nemůže! Jestliže tak učiníš, budeš patřit mezi nespravedlivé.
null.verse 10:107: A když se tě Bůh dotkne zlým, nikdo kromě Něho tě toho nezbaví.
null.verse 10:108: Rci: "Lidé, nyní k vám přišla věru pravda od Pána vašeho.
null.verse 10:109: Následuj tedy to, co ti bylo vnuknuto, a trpělivě vyčkávej, až Bůh bude soudit a Bůh věru nejlepším je soudcem.

null.verse 10:2: Is het vreemd voor de mensen, dat Wij een man uit hun midden openbaarden: "Waarschuw het mensdom en geef blijde tijding aan degenen die geloven, dat zij een ware rang bij hun Heer zullen hebben"? De ongelovigen zeggen: "Voorzeker, deze is een openlijke tovenaar.
null.verse 10:3: Voorwaar, God is uw Heer, Die de hemelen en de aarde in zes dagen schiep, en Hij zette Zich op de troon, alles regelend.
null.verse 10:4: Tot Hem is uw aller terugkeer, dit is de ware belofte van uw Heer.
null.verse 10:5: Hij is het, Die de zon tot een stralend licht maakte en de maan tot een helder licht en er stadia voor verordende, zodat je het getal der jaren en het berekenen (van de tijd) mocht kennen.
null.verse 10:6: Voorwaar, in de wisseling van dag en nacht en in al hetgeen God in de hemelen en op aarde heeft geschapen zijn er tekenen voor een godvrezend volk.
null.verse 10:7: Voorzeker, die niet uitzien naar de ontmoeting met Ons en die met het leven dezer wereld tevreden zijn en er voldoening in vinden en degenen, die onoplettend op Onze tekenen zijn,
null.verse 10:8: Dezen zijn het, wier verblijfplaats het Vuur is, voor hetgeen zij verdienen.
null.verse 10:9: Maar degenen die geloven en goede werken doen, hun Heer zal hen wegens hun geloof leiden.
null.verse 10:10: Hun aanroep daarin zal zijn: "Heilig zijt Gij, O God!" en hun groet "Vrede".
null.verse 10:11: En indien God het boze voor de mensen zou verhaasten, zoals Hij voor hen het goede verhaast, zou hun tijd reeds gekomen zijn.
null.verse 10:12: En wanneer de mens een moeilijkheid overkomt, bidt hij tot Ons, op zijn zijde liggende, of zittende, of staande, maar wanneer Wij zijn last van hem hebben verwijderd, gaat hij zijn gang, alsof hij Ons nooit vóór de verwijdering van zijn moeilijkheid had aangeroepen.
null.verse 10:13: En Wij vernietigden de geslachten die vóór u bestonden toen zij kwaad verrichtten en er kwamen tot hen boodschappers met duidelijke tekenen, maar zij wilden niet geloven.
null.verse 10:14: En na hen hebben Wij u tot stedehouders op aarde gesteld, opdat Wij zien, hoe je zoudt handelen.
null.verse 10:15: En wanneer hun Onze duidelijke tekenen worden voorgedragen, zeggen degenen, die niet naar de ontmoeting met Ons uitzien: "Breng een andere Koran dan deze, of verander hem.
null.verse 10:16: Zeg: "Als God het zo had gewild, zou ik u niet hebben voorgedragen (de Koran), noch zou Hij u deze bekend hebben gemaakt.
null.verse 10:17: Wie is dan onrechtvaardiger, hij, die een leugen over God spreekt, of die Zijn tekenen verloochent? Voorzeker, de schuldigen zullen nooit slagen.
null.verse 10:18: En zij bidden buiten God om tot datgene wat hen schaden noch baten kan en zij zeggen: "Dezen zijn onze bemiddelaars bij God.
null.verse 10:19: En het mensdom was slechts één gemeenschap, daarna verschilden zij en ware het Woord van uw Heer niet uitgegaan, voorzeker zou er over hun geschil beslist zijn.
null.verse 10:20: En zij zeggen: "Waarom is er geen teken van zijn Heer tot hem (de profeet) neergezonden?" Zeg: "Het onzienlijke behoort alleen God toe.
null.verse 10:21: En wanneer Wij mensen barmhartigheid doen smaken nadat tegenspoed hen overviel, zie! zij beginnen tegen Onze tekenen plannen te smeden.
null.verse 10:22: Hij is het, Die u in staat stelt door het land en op zee te reizen, totdat, wanneer je op de schepen zijt en zij met een mooie bries varen en (de opvarenden) er zich in verheugen, hen een geweldige wind achterhaalt en de golven van alle zijden over hen komen en zij overtuigd zijn dat zij verloren zijn; dan roepen zij God in oprechte aanbidding aan: "Als Gij ons hiervan redt, zullen wij zeker tot de dankbaren behoren.
null.verse 10:23: Maar wanneer Hij hen heeft gered, ziet, beginnen zij ten onrechte een opstand in het land te ontketenen.
null.verse 10:24: De gelijkenis van het tegenwoordige leven is slechts als water, dat Wij uit de wolken neerzenden, daarna groeit hierdoor het gewas van de aarde weelderig, waarvan mensen en vee eten, totdat, wanneer de aarde haar sier ontvangt en er schoon uitziet en haar eigenaars denken, dat zij er macht over bezitten, Ons gebod bij dag of bij nacht tot haar komt, dan maken Wij haar tot een gemaaid veld, alsof er de vorige dag niets was geweest.
null.verse 10:25: En God roept naar het tehuis van Vrede en leidt wie Hij wil naar het rechte pad.
null.verse 10:26: Er zal voor degenen die goede daden verrichten het goede zijn en nog meer.
null.verse 10:27: En degenen die boze daden verrichten, de vergelding van het kwaad zal het gelijke daaraan zijn en de schaamte zal hen bedekken.
null.verse 10:28: En de Dag waarop Wij hen allen zullen verzamelen, zullen Wij tot de afgodendienaren zeggen: "Blijft ter plaatse, gij en uw deelgenoten.
null.verse 10:29: "God is nu toereikend als Getuige tussen u en ons.
null.verse 10:30: Daarna zal iedere ziel ondervinden wat zij heeft gedaan.
null.verse 10:31: Zeg: "Wie voorziet u van voedsel van de hemel en de aarde? Of wie is het, die macht heeft over de oren en de ogen? En wie brengt de levenden uit de doden en de doden uit de levenden voort? En wie bestuurt het al?" Zij zullen zeggen: "God.
null.verse 10:32: Zo is God, uw ware Heer.
null.verse 10:33: Zo is het woord van uw Heer bewaarheid tegen degenen, die overtraden omdat zij niet geloofden.
null.verse 10:34: Zeg: "Is er één uwer afgoden die de schepping voortbrengt en deze daarna voortzet?" Zeg: "God is het, Die de schepping voortbrengt, en deze voortzet.
null.verse 10:35: Zeg: "Is er één uwer afgoden, die tot de waarheid leidt?" Zeg: "God is het, Die tot de waarheid leidt.
null.verse 10:36: En de meesten hunner volgen niets dan vermoeden.
null.verse 10:37: En deze Koran kon door niemand buiten God worden voortgebracht.
null.verse 10:38: Of zeggen zij: "Hij (de profeet) heeft het verzonnen"? Zeg: "Brengt dan een hieraan gelijke Soerah voort en roept buiten God wie je kunt (om hulp aan), als je waarachtig bent.
null.verse 10:39: Neen, zij loochenen datgene waarvan zij de kennis niet konden omvatten, noch is de uiteindelijke betekenis er van tot hen gekomen.
null.verse 10:40: En er zijn sommigen onder hen die er in geloven en er zijn sommigen onder hen die er niet in geloven en uw Heer kent de onruststokers goed.
null.verse 10:41: En indien zij u van leugen besehuldigen, zeg dan: "Aan mij mijn werk en aan u uw werk.
null.verse 10:42: En er zijn sommigen onder hen die naar u luisteren.
null.verse 10:43: En er zijn sommigen onder hen die naar u kijken.
null.verse 10:44: Voorzeker, God doet de mensen in het geheel geen onrecht aan, maar de mensen doen hun eigen ziel onrecht aan.
null.verse 10:45: En de Dag, waarop Hij hen zal verzamelen, zal het hun toeschijnen, alsof zig slechts een uur van een dag (in de wereld) hadden vertoefd.
null.verse 10:46: En als Wij u sommige der dingen, waarmee Wij hen hebben bedreigd, tonen, of als Wij u doen sterven, dan is tot Ons hun terugkeer en God is Getuige van al hetgeen zij doen.
null.verse 10:47: Voor elk volk is er een boodschapper.
null.verse 10:48: En zij zeggen: "Wanneer zal deze belofte worden vervuld, als je de waarheid spreekt?"
null.verse 10:49: Zeg: "Ik heb voor mij zelf geen macht over schade of voordeel, behalve, wat God wil.
null.verse 10:50: Zeg: "Vertelt mij, als Zijn straf bij dag of nacht over u komt, hoe zullen dan de schuldigen weg kunnen lopen?"
null.verse 10:51: "Zult gij dan, wanneer het u overvalt er in geloven?" Nu? Terwijl je dit wilde verhaasten?"
null.verse 10:52: Dan zal er tot degenen die kwaad deden worden gezegd: "Ondergaat de blijvende straf.
null.verse 10:53: En zij vragen u: "Is dit de waarheid?" Zeg: "Ja, bij mijn Heer, het is zeker waar en je kunt het niet verijdelen.
null.verse 10:54: En indien elke ziel die onrechtvaardig handelt al hetgeen op aarde is, zou bezitten, zou zij er zich voorzeker mede trachten vrij te kopen.
null.verse 10:55: Ziet toe! aan God behoort al hetgeen in de hemelen en op aarde is en weet, dat God’s belofte waar is.
null.verse 10:56: Hij geeft leven en doet sterven en tot Hem zul je worden teruggebracht.
null.verse 10:57: O mensdom! Er is van uw Heer een vermaning tot u gekomen en genezing voor wat in de harten is en een leiding en barmhartigheid jegens de gelovigen.
null.verse 10:58: Zeg: "Dit alles is door de genade van God en door Zijn barmhartigheid; laat hen er zich daarom in verheugen.
null.verse 10:59: Zeg: "Heb je overwogen, dat God u een voorziening heeft neergezonden en dat je daarna een gedeelte er van onwettig en een gedeelte er van wettig verklaarde?" Vraag (hen): "Heeft God u dat toegestaan, of verzin je leugens tegen God?"
null.verse 10:60: Wat denken degenen die leugens tegen God verzinnen van de Dag der Opstanding? Voorzeker, God is genadevol tegenover het mensdom, maar de meesten hunner zijn niet dankbaar.
null.verse 10:61: In welke toestand gij u bevindt, of gij de Koran voordraagt, of iets anders doet; Wij zijn uw getuigen, terwijl gij u er in verdiept.
null.verse 10:62: Ziet! voorzeker, de vrienden van God zullen geen vrees hebben, noch zullen zij treuren.
null.verse 10:63: Zig die geloven en zich aan rechtvaardigheid houden,
null.verse 10:64: Er zijn voor hen blijde tijdingen in het tegenwoordige leven en het Hiernamaals.
null.verse 10:65: En laat hun woorden u niet verdrieten.
null.verse 10:66: Ziet! voorzeker, van God is al hetgeen in de hemelen en op aarde bestaat.
null.verse 10:67: Hij is het, Die de nacht voor u heeft gesteld, opdat gij er in moogt rusten en de dag vol van licht.
null.verse 10:68: Zij zeggen: "God heeft een zoon tot Zich genomen.
null.verse 10:69: Zeg: "Degenen, die over God een leugen verzinnen, zullen niet slagen.
null.verse 10:70: Zij zullen in deze wereld tijdelijk genieten, daarna zal hun terugkeer tot Ons zijn, dan zullen Wij hen een strenge straf doen ondergaan, omdat zij niet geloofden.
null.verse 10:71: En verkondig hun het verhaal van Noach, toen hij tot zijn volk zeide: "O, mijn volk, als mijn houding en mijn vermaning door de tekenen van God u aanstoot geven - ik leg mijn vertrouwen in God - breng dan al uw plannen en uw afgoden bijeen; laat dan uw handelwijze duidelijk blijken, komt dan tegen mij op en geeft mij geen uitstel.
null.verse 10:72: Maar als gij u terugtrekt vraag ik van u geen beloning.
null.verse 10:73: Maar zij verloochenden hem; daarom redden Wij hem en degenen die met hem in de ark waren.
null.verse 10:74: Toen zonden Wij na hem andere boodschappers naar hun volk en deze kwamen tot hen met duidelijke bewijzen.
null.verse 10:75: Dan zonden Wij na hen Mozes en Aäron met Onze tekenen naar Pharao en zijn leiders, maar zij handelden aanmatigend.
null.verse 10:76: En toen de waarheid van Ons tot hen kwam, zeiden zij: "Dit is gewis duidelijke tovenarij.
null.verse 10:77: Mozes zeide: "Zeg je dit van de waarheid nadat zij tot u is gekomen? Is dit tovenarij? Maar tovenaars slagen nooit.
null.verse 10:78: Zij antwoordden: "Zijt gij tot ons gekomen, opdat wij ons mogen afwenden van hetgeen wij onze vaderen zagen volgen zodat er voor u beiden grootheid in het land zou zijn? Maar wij zullen in u niet geloven.
null.verse 10:79: En Pharao zeide: "Brengt mij elke bedreven tovenaar.
null.verse 10:80: En toen de tovenaars kwamen, zeide Mozes tot hen: "Werpt hetgeen gij wildet werpen.
null.verse 10:81: En toen zij wierpen zeide Mozes: "Wat gij hebt gebracht is slechts bedrog.
null.verse 10:82: En God bevestigt de waarheid door Zijn woorden, zelfs al zijn de sehuldigen afkerig.
null.verse 10:83: En niemand geloofde Mozes, dan enige jongelingen van onder zijn volk, uit vrees voor Pharao en zijn leiders, in geval hij hen zou vervolgen.
null.verse 10:84: En Mozes zeide: "O mijn volk, indien gij in God hebt geloofd stelt dan uw vertrouwen in Hem, als gij Moslims zijt.
null.verse 10:85: En zij antwoordden: "Wij leggen ons vertrouwen in God: Onze Heer, maak ons niet tot voorwerp van vervolging voor het onrechtvaardige volk.
null.verse 10:86: En red ons door Uw barmhartigheid van de ongelovigen.
null.verse 10:87: Wij openbaarden aan Mozes en zijn broeder: "Neem je beiden huizen voor uw volk in Egypte en bouwt uw huizen tegenover elkaar en houdt het gebed.
null.verse 10:88: En Mozes zeide: "Onze Heer, Gij hebt Pharao en zijn leiders versieringen en rijkdommen in het tegenwoordige leven geschonken, zodat zij, Onze Heer, van Uw pad afleiden.
null.verse 10:89: God zeide: "Uw gebed is aanvaard.
null.verse 10:90: En Wij brachten de kinderen Israëls over de zee; Pharao en zijn scharen vervolgden hen op een onrechtvaardige en aanvallende wijze, totdat hij toen hij bijna verdronk, zeide: "Ik geloof dat er geen God is dan Hij, in Wie de kinderen Israëls geloven en ik behoor tot de Moslims.
null.verse 10:91: Nu? Terwijl gij voordien ongehoorzaam waart en tot de onruststokers behoordet?
null.verse 10:92: Heden zullen Wij uw lichaam redden, opdat gij een teken moogt zijn voor degenen die na u komen.
null.verse 10:93: En Wij wezen de kinderen Israëls een uitstekend tehuis aan en Wij voorzagen hen van goede dingen en zij verschilden niet van mening voordat de kennis tot hen kwam.
null.verse 10:94: En als gij over hetgeen Wij tot u hebben neergezonden twijfelt, vraagt dan degenen die het Boek vóór u hebben gelezen.
null.verse 10:95: En behoor niet tot degenen, die de tekenen van God verloochenen, anders zul je tot de verliezers behoren.
null.verse 10:96: Degenen tegen wie het woord van uw Heer van kracht is geworden, willen niet geloven.
null.verse 10:97: Zelfs al werd elk teken hun getoond, voordat zij de smartelijke straf hebben gezien.
null.verse 10:98: Waarom heeft, behalve het volk van Jonas geen stad geloofd, zodat hun geloof hen zou hebben kunnen helpen? Toen zij geloofden, verwijderden Wij de straf der schande in het tegenwoordige leven van hen en Wij lieten hen voor een wijle genieten.
null.verse 10:99: En indien uw Heer had gewild, zouden allen die op aarde zijn, zeker tezamen hebben geloofd.
null.verse 10:100: Doch geen ziel kan geloven zonder verlof van God.
null.verse 10:101: Zeg: "Overweeg, wat in de hemelen en op aarde gebeurt.
null.verse 10:102: Verwachten zij iets anders dan het gelijke (oordeel) van de dagen dergenen, die vóór hen stierven? Zeg: "Wacht daarom, ik ben met u onder de wachtenden.
null.verse 10:103: Dan redden Wij Onze boodschappers en de gelovigen.
null.verse 10:104: Zeg: "O gij mensen, als gij over mijn godsdienst in twijfel verkeert, (weet) dan dat ik niet aanbid degenen die gij naast God aanbidt, maar ik aanbid God Die u doet sterven en het is mij geboden tot de gelovigen te behoren.
null.verse 10:105: En wend uw aangezicht oprecht tot deze godsdienst en behoor niet tot de afgodendienaren.
null.verse 10:106: En roep naast God niet datgene aan, dat u bevoordelen noch schaden kan.
null.verse 10:107: En als God u door het kwade treft, is er niemand die dit kan verwijderen dan Hij; en als Hij het goede voor u wenst, is er niemand die Zijn genade kan beletten.
null.verse 10:108: Zeg: "O, gij mensen, nu is de waarheid van uw Heer tot u gekomen.
null.verse 10:109: En volg hetgeen u is geopenbaard en wees standvastig, totdat God oordeelt.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:2: Is it a wonder for mankind that We have inspired a man among them, saying: Warn mankind and bring unto those who believe the good tidings that they have a sure footing with their Lord ? The disbelievers say: Lo! this is a mere wizard.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:3: Lo! your Lord is Allah Who created the heavens and the earth in six Days, then He established Himself upon the Throne, directing all things.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:4: Unto Him is the return of all of you; it is a promise of Allah in truth.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:5: He it is Who appointed the sun a splendour and the moon a light, and measured for her stages, that ye might know the number of the years, and the reckoning.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:6: Lo! in the difference of day and night and all that Allah hath created in the heavens and the earth are portents, verily, for folk who ward off (evil).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:7: Lo! those who expect not the meeting with Us but desire the life of the world and feel secure therein, and those who are neglectful of Our revelations,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:8: Their home will be the Fire because of what they used to earn.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:9: Lo! those who believe and do good works, their Lord guideth them by their faith.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:10: Their prayer therein will be: Glory be to Thee, O Allah! and their greeting therein will be: Peace.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:11: If Allah were to hasten on for men the ill (that they have earned) as they would hasten on the good, their respite would already have expired.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:12: And if misfortune touch a man he crieth unto Us, (while reclining) on his side, or sitting or standing, but when We have relieved him of the misfortune he goeth his way as though he had not cried unto Us because of a misfortune that afflicted him.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:13: We destroyed the generations before you when they did wrong; and their messengers (from Allah) came unto them with clear proofs (of His Sovereignty) but they would not believe.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:14: Then We appointed you viceroys in the earth after them, that We might see how ye behave.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:15: And when Our clear revelations are recited unto them, they who look not for the meeting with Us say: Bring a Lecture other than this, or change it.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:16: Say: If Allah had so willed I should not have recited it to you nor would He have made it known to you.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:17: Who doeth greater wrong than he who inventeth a lie concerning Allah and denieth His revelations ? Lo! the guilty never are successful.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:18: They worship beside Allah that which neither hurteth them nor profiteth them, and they say: These are our intercessors with Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:19: Mankind were but one community; then they differed; and had it not been for a word that had already gone forth from thy Lord it had been judged between them in respect of that wherein they differ.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:20: And they will say: If only a portent were sent down upon him from his Lord! Then say, (O Muhammad): The Unseen belongeth to Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:21: And when We cause mankind to taste of mercy after some adversity which had afflicted them, behold! they have some plot against Our revelations.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:22: He it is Who maketh you to go on the land and the sea till, when ye are in the ships and they sail with them with a fair breeze and they are glad therein, a storm-wind reacheth them and the wave cometh unto them from every side and they deem that they are overwhelmed therein; (then) they cry unto Allah, making their faith pure for Him only: If Thou deliver us from this, we truly will be of the thankful.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:23: Yet when He hath delivered them, behold! they rebel in the earth wrongfully.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:24: The similitude of the life of the world is only as water which We send down from the sky, then the earth’s growth of that which men and cattle eat mingleth with it till, when the earth hath taken on her ornaments and is embellished, and her people deem that they are masters of her, Our commandment cometh by night or by day and We make it as reaped corn as if it had not flourished yesterday.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:25: And Allah summoneth to the abode of peace, and leadeth whom He will to a straight path.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:26: For those who do good is the best (reward) and more (thereto).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:27: And those who earn ill-deeds, (for them) requital of each ill-deed by the like thereof; and ignominy overtaketh them - They have no protector from Allah - as if their faces had been covered with a cloak of darkest night.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:28: On the day when We gather them all together, then We say unto those who ascribed partners (unto Us): Stand back, ye and your (pretended) partners (of Allah)! And We separate them, the one from the other, and their (pretended) partners say: It was not us ye worshipped.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:29: Allah sufficeth as a witness between us and you, that we were unaware of your worship.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:30: There doth every soul experience that which it did aforetime, and they are returned unto Allah, their rightful Lord, and that which they used to invent hath failed them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:31: Say (unto them, O Muhammad): Who provideth for you from the sky and the earth, or Who owneth hearing and sight; and Who bringeth forth the living from the dead and bringeth forth the dead from the living; and Who directeth the course ? They will say: Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:32: Such then is Allah, your rightful Lord.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:33: Thus is the Word of thy Lord justified concerning those who do wrong: that they believe not.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:34: Say: Is there of your partners (whom ye ascribe unto Allah) one that produceth Creation and then reproduceth it ? Say: Allah produceth Creation, then reproduceth it.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:35: Say: Is there of your partners (whom ye ascribe unto Allah) one that leadeth to the Truth ? Say: Allah leadeth to the Truth.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:36: Most of them follow not but conjecture.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:37: And this Qur’an is not such as could ever be invented in despite of Allah; but it is a confirmation of that which was before it and an exposition of that which is decreed for mankind - Therein is no doubt - from the Lord of the Worlds.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:38: Or say they: He hath invented it ? Say: Then bring a surah like unto it, and call (for help) on all ye can besides Allah, if ye are truthful.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:39: Nay, but they denied that, the knowledge whereof they could not compass, and whereof the interpretation (in events) hath not yet come unto them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:40: And of them is he who believeth therein, and of them is he who believeth not therein, and thy Lord is Best Aware of the corrupters.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:41: And if they deny thee, say: Unto me my work, and unto you your work.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:42: And of them are some who listen unto thee.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:43: And of them is he who looketh toward thee.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:44: Lo! Allah wrongeth not mankind in aught; but mankind wrong themselves.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:45: And on the day when He shall gather them together, (when it will seem) as though they had tarried but an hour of the day, recognising one another, those will verily have perished who denied the meeting with Allah and were not guided.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:46: Whether We let thee (O Muhammad) behold something of that which We promise them or (whether We) cause thee to die, still unto Us is their return, and Allah, moreover, is Witness over what they do.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:47: And for every nation there is a messenger.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:48: And they say: When will this promise be fulfilled, if ye are truthful ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:49: Say: I have no power to hurt or benefit myself, save that which Allah willeth.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:50: Say: Have ye thought: When His doom cometh unto you as a raid by night, or in the (busy) day; what is there of it that the guilty ones desire to hasten ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:51: Is it (only) then, when it hath befallen you, that ye will believe ? What! (Believe) now, when (until now) ye have been hastening it on (through disbelief) ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:52: Then will it be said unto those who dealt unjustly Taste the torment of eternity.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:53: And they ask thee to inform them (saying): Is it true ? Say: Yea, by my Lord, verily it is true, and ye cannot escape.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:54: And if each soul that doeth wrong had all that is in the earth it would seek to ransom itself therewith; and they will feel remorse within them, when they see the doom.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:55: Lo! verily all that is in the heavens and the earth is Allah’s.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:56: He quickeneth and giveth death, and unto Him ye will be returned.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:57: O mankind! There hath come unto you an exhortation from your Lord, a balm for that which is in the breasts, a guidance and a mercy for believers.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:58: Say: In the bounty of Allah and in His mercy: therein let them rejoice.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:59: Say: Have ye considered what provision Allah hath sent down for you, how ye have made of it lawful and unlawful ? Hath Allah permitted you, or do ye invent a lie concerning Allah ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:60: And what think those who invent a lie concerning Allah (will be their plight) upon the Day of Resurrection ? Lo! Allah truly is Bountiful toward mankind, but most of them give not thanks.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:61: And thou (Muhammad) art not occupied with any business and thou recitest not a Lecture from this (Scripture), and ye (mankind) perform no act, but We are Witness of you when ye are engaged therein.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:62: Lo! verily the friends of Allah are (those) on whom fear (cometh) not, nor do they grieve ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:63: Those who believe and keep their duty (to Allah).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:64: Theirs are good tidings in the life of the world and in the Hereafter - There is no changing the Words of Allah - that is the Supreme Triumph.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:65: And let not their speech grieve thee (O Muhammad).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:66: Lo! is it not unto Allah that belongeth whosoever is in the heavens and whosoever is in the earth ? Those who follow aught instead of Allah follow not (His) partners.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:67: He it is Who hath appointed for you the night that ye should rest therein and the day giving sight.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:68: They say: Allah hath taken (unto Him) a son - Glorified be He! He hath no needs! His is all that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:69: Say: Verily those who invent a lie concerning Allah will not succeed.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:70: This world’s portion (will be theirs), then unto Us is their return.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:71: Recite unto them the story of Noah, when he told his people: O my people! If my sojourn (here) and my reminding you by Allah’s revelations are an offence unto you, in Allah have I put my trust, so decide upon your course of action you and your partners.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:72: But if ye are averse I have asked of you no wage.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:73: But they denied him, so We saved him and those with him in the ship, and made them viceroys (in the earth), while We drowned those who denied Our revelations.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:74: Then, after him, We sent messengers unto their folk, and they brought them clear proofs.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:75: Then, after them, We sent Moses and Aaron unto Pharaoh and his chiefs with Our revelations, but they were arrogant and were a guilty folk.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:76: And when the Truth from Our presence came unto them, they said: Lo! this is mere magic.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:77: Moses said: Speak ye (so) of the Truth when it hath come unto you ? Is this magic ? Now magicians thrive not.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:78: They said: Hast thou come unto us to pervert us from that (faith) in which we found our fathers, and that you two may own the place of greatness in the land ? We will not believe you two.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:79: And Pharaoh said: Bring every cunning wizard unto me.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:80: And when the wizards came, Moses said unto them: Cast your cast!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:81: And when they had cast, Moses said: That which ye have brought is magic.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:82: And Allah will vindicate the Truth by His words, however much the guilty be averse.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:83: But none trusted Moses, save some scions of his people, (and they were) in fear of Pharaoh and their chiefs, that he would persecute them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:84: And Moses said: O my people! If ye have believed in Allah then put trust in Him, if ye have indeed surrendered (unto Him)!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:85: They said: In Allah we put trust.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:86: And, of Thy mercy, save us from the folk that disbelieve.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:87: And We inspired Moses and his brother, (saying): Appoint houses for your people in Egypt and make your houses oratories, and establish worship.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:88: And Moses said: Our Lord! Lo! Thou hast given Pharaoh and his chiefs splendour and riches in the life of the world, Our Lord! that they may lead men astray from Thy way.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:89: He said: Your prayer is heard.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:90: And We brought the Children of Israel across the sea, and Pharaoh with his hosts pursued them in rebellion and transgression, till, when the (fate of) drowning overtook him, he exclaimed: I believe that there is no God save Him in Whom the Children of Israel believe, and I am of those who surrender (unto Him).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:91: What! Now! When hitherto thou hast rebelled and been of the wrong-doers ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:92: But this day We save thee in thy body that thou mayst be a portent for those after thee.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:93: And We verily did allot unto the Children of Israel a fixed abode, and did provide them with good things; and they differed not until the knowledge came unto them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:94: And if thou (Muhammad) art in doubt concerning that which We reveal unto thee, then question those who read the Scripture (that was) before thee.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:95: And be not thou of those who deny the revelations of Allah, for then wert thou of the losers.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:96: Lo! those for whom the word of thy Lord (concerning sinners) hath effect will not believe,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:97: Though every token come unto them, till they see the painful doom.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:98: If only there had been a community (of all those that were destroyed of old) that believed and profited by its belief as did the folk of Jonah! When they believed We drew off from them the torment of disgrace in the life of the world and gave them comfort for a while.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:99: And if thy Lord willed, all who are in the earth would have believed together.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:100: It is not for any soul to believe save by the permission of Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:101: Say: Behold what is in the heavens and the earth! But revelations and warnings avail not folk who will not believe.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:102: What expect they save the like of the days of those who passed away before them ? Say: Expect then! I am with you among the expectant.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:103: Then shall We save Our messengers and the believers, in like manner (as of old).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:104: Say (O Muhammad): O mankind! If ye are in doubt of my religion, then (know that) I worship not those whom ye worship instead of Allah, but I worship Allah Who causeth you to die, and I have been commanded to be of the believers.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:105: And, (O Muhammad) set thy purpose resolutely for religion, as a man by nature upright, and be not of those who ascribe partners (to Allah).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:106: And cry not, beside Allah, unto that which cannot profit thee nor hurt thee, for if thou didst so then wert thou of the wrong-doers.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:107: If Allah afflicteth thee with some hurt, there is none who can remove it save Him; and if He desireth good for thee, there is none who can repel His bounty.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:108: Say: O mankind! Now hath the Truth from your Lord come unto you.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 10:109: And (O Muhammad) follow that which is inspired in thee, and forbear until Allah give judgment.

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:2: Is it a matter of wonderment to men that We have sent Our inspiration to a man from among themselves?- that he should warn mankind (of their danger), and give the good news to the Believers that they have before their Lord the lofty rank of truth.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:3: Verily your Lord is God, who created the heavens and the earth in six days, and is firmly established on the throne (of authority), regulating and governing all things.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:4: To Him will be your return- of all of you.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:5: It is He Who made the sun to be a shining glory and the moon to be a light (of beauty), and measured out stages for her; that ye might know the number of years and the count (of time).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:6: Verily, in the alternation of the night and the day, and in all that God hath created, in the heavens and the earth, are signs for those who fear Him.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:7: Those who rest not their hope on their meeting with Us, but are pleased and satisfied with the life of the present, and those who heed not Our Signs,-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:8: Their abode is the Fire, because of the (evil) they earned.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:9: Those who believe, and work righteousness,- their Lord will guide them because of their faith: beneath them will flow rivers in gardens of bliss.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:10: (This will be) their cry therein: "Glory to Thee, O God!" And "Peace" will be their greeting therein! and the close of their cry will be: "Praise be to God, the Cherisher and Sustainer of the worlds!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:11: If God were to hasten for men the ill (they have earned) as they would fain hasten on the good,- then would their respite be settled at once.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:12: When trouble toucheth a man, He crieth unto Us (in all postures)- lying down on his side, or sitting, or standing.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:13: Generations before you We destroyed when they did wrong: their apostles came to them with clear-signs, but they would not believe! thus do We requite those who sin!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:14: Then We made you heirs in the land after them, to see how ye would behave!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:15: But when Our Clear Signs are rehearsed unto them, those who rest not their hope on their meeting with Us, Say: "Bring us a reading other than this, or change this," Say: "It is not for me, of my own accord, to change it: I follow naught but what is revealed unto me: if I were to disobey my Lord, I should myself fear the penalty of a Great Day (to come).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:16: Say: "If God had so willed, I should not have rehearsed it to you, nor would He have made it known to you.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:17: Who doth more wrong than such as forge a lie against God, or deny His Signs? But never will prosper those who sin.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:18: They serve, besides God, things that hurt them not nor profit them, and they say: "These are our intercessors with God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:19: Mankind was but one nation, but differed (later).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:20: They say: "Why is not a sign sent down to him from his Lord?" Say: "The Unseen is only for God (to know), then wait ye: I too will wait with you.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:21: When We make mankind taste of some mercy after adversity hath touched them, behold! they take to plotting against Our Signs! Say: "Swifter to plan is God!" Verily, Our messengers record all the plots that ye make!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:22: He it is Who enableth you to traverse through land and sea; so that ye even board ships;- they sail with them with a favourable wind, and they rejoice thereat; then comes a stormy wind and the waves come to them from all sides, and they think they are being overwhelmed: they cry unto God, sincerely offering (their) duty unto Him saying, "If thou dost deliver us from this, we shall truly show our gratitude!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:23: But when he delivereth them, behold! they transgress insolently through the earth in defiance of right! O mankind! your insolence is against your own souls,- an enjoyment of the life of the present: in the end, to Us is your return, and We shall show you the truth of all that ye did.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:24: The likeness of the life of the present is as the rain which We send down from the skies: by its mingling arises the produce of the earth- which provides food for men and animals: (It grows) till the earth is clad with its golden ornaments and is decked out (in beauty): the people to whom it belongs think they have all powers of disposal over it: There reaches it Our command by night or by day, and We make it like a harvest clean-mown, as if it had not flourished only the day before! thus do We explain the Signs in detail for those who reflect.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:25: But God doth call to the Home of Peace: He doth guide whom He pleaseth to a way that is straight.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:26: To those who do right is a goodly (reward)- Yea, more (than in measure)! No darkness nor shame shall cover their faces! they are companions of the garden; they will abide therein (for aye)!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:27: But those who have earned evil will have a reward of like evil: ignominy will cover their (faces): No defender will they have from (the wrath of) God: Their faces will be covered, as it were, with pieces from the depth of the darkness of night: they are companions of the Fire: they will abide therein (for aye)!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:28: One day shall We gather them all together.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:29: "Enough is God for a witness between us and you: we certainly knew nothing of your worship of us!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:30: There will every soul prove (the fruits of) the deeds it sent before: they will be brought back to God their rightful Lord, and their invented falsehoods will leave them in the lurch.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:31: Say: "Who is it that sustains you (in life) from the sky and from the earth? or who is it that has power over hearing and sight? And who is it that brings out the living from the dead and the dead from the living? and who is it that rules and regulates all affairs?" They will soon say, "God".
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:32: Such is God, your real Cherisher and Sustainer: apart from truth, what (remains) but error? How then are ye turned away?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:33: Thus is the word of thy Lord proved true against those who rebel: Verily they will not believe.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:34: Say: "Of your ’partners’, can any originate creation and repeat it?" Say: "It is God Who originates creation and repeats it: then how are ye deluded away (from the truth)?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:35: Say: "Of your ’partners’ is there any that can give any guidance towards truth?" Say: "It is God Who gives guidance towards truth, is then He Who gives guidance to truth more worthy to be followed, or he who finds not guidance (himself) unless he is guided? what then is the matter with you? How judge ye?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:36: But most of them follow nothing but fancy: truly fancy can be of no avail against truth.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:37: This Qur’an is not such as can be produced by other than God; on the contrary it is a confirmation of (revelations) that went before it, and a fuller explanation of the Book - wherein there is no doubt - from the Lord of the worlds.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:38: Or do they say, "He forged it"? say: "Bring then a Sura like unto it, and call (to your aid) anyone you can besides God, if it be ye speak the truth!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:39: Nay, they charge with falsehood that whose knowledge they cannot compass, even before the elucidation thereof hath reached them: thus did those before them make charges of falsehood: but see what was the end of those who did wrong!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:40: Of them there are some who believe therein, and some who do not: and thy Lord knoweth best those who are out for mischief.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:41: If they charge thee with falsehood, say: "My work to me, and yours to you! ye are free from responsibility for what I do, and I for what ye do!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:42: Among them are some who (pretend to) listen to thee: But canst thou make the deaf to hear,- even though they are without understanding?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:43: And among them are some who look at thee: but canst thou guide the blind,- even though they will not see?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:44: Verily God will not deal unjustly with man in aught: It is man that wrongs his own soul.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:45: One day He will gather them together: (It will be) as if they had tarried but an hour of a day: they will recognise each other: assuredly those will be lost who denied the meeting with God and refused to receive true guidance.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:46: Whether We show thee (realised in thy life-time) some part of what We promise them,- or We take thy soul (to Our Mercy) (Before that),- in any case, to Us is their return: ultimately God is witness, to all that they do.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:47: To every people (was sent) an apostle: when their apostle comes (before them), the matter will be judged between them with justice, and they will not be wronged.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:48: They say: "When will this promise come to pass,- if ye speak the truth?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:49: Say: "I have no power over any harm or profit to myself except as God willeth.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:50: Say: "Do ye see,- if His punishment should come to you by night or by day,- what portion of it would the sinners wish to hasten?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:51: "Would ye then believe in it at last, when it actually cometh to pass? (It will then be said): ’Ah! now? and ye wanted (aforetime) to hasten it on!’
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:52: "At length will be said to the wrong-doers: ’Taste ye the enduring punishment! ye get but the recompense of what ye earned!’"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:53: They seek to be informed by thee: "Is that true?" Say: "Aye! by my Lord! it is the very truth! and ye cannot frustrate it!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:54: Every soul that hath sinned, if it possessed all that is on earth, would fain give it in ransom: They would declare (their) repentance when they see the penalty: but the judgment between them will be with justice, and no wrong will be done unto them.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:55: Is it not (the case) that to God belongeth whatever is in the heavens and on earth? Is it not (the case) that God’s promise is assuredly true? Yet most of them understand not.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:56: It is He Who giveth life and who taketh it, and to Him shall ye all be brought back.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:57: O mankind! there hath come to you a direction from your Lord and a healing for the (diseases) in your hearts,- and for those who believe, a guidance and a Mercy.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:59: Say: "See ye what things God hath sent down to you for sustenance? Yet ye hold forbidden some things thereof and (some things) lawful.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:60: And what think those who invent lies against God, of the Day of Judgment? Verily God is full of bounty to mankind, but most of them are ungrateful.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:61: In whatever business thou mayest be, and whatever portion thou mayest be reciting from the Qur’an,- and whatever deed ye (mankind) may be doing,- We are witnesses thereof when ye are deeply engrossed therein.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:62: Behold! verily on the friends of God there is no fear, nor shall they grieve;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:63: Those who believe and (constantly) guard against evil;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:64: For them are glad tidings, in the life of the present and in the Hereafter; no change can there be in the words of God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:65: Let not their speech grieve thee: for all power and honour belong to God: It is He Who heareth and knoweth (all things).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:66: Behold! verily to God belong all creatures, in the heavens and on earth.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:67: He it is That hath made you the night that ye may rest therein, and the day to make things visible (to you).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:68: They say: "God hath begotten a son!" - Glory be to Him! He is self-sufficient! His are all things in the heavens and on earth! No warrant have ye for this! say ye about God what ye know not?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:69: Say: "Those who invent a lie against God will never prosper.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:70: A little enjoyment in this world!- and then, to Us will be their return, then shall We make them taste the severest penalty for their blasphemies.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:71: Relate to them the story of Noah.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:72: "But if ye turn back, (consider): no reward have I asked of you: my reward is only due from God, and I have been commanded to be of those who submit to God’s will (in Islam).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:73: They rejected Him, but We delivered him, and those with him, in the Ark, and We made them inherit (the earth), while We overwhelmed in the flood those who rejected Our Signs.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:74: Then after him We sent (many) apostles to their peoples: they brought them Clear Signs, but they would not believe what they had already rejected beforehand.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:75: Then after them sent We Moses and Aaron to Pharaoh and his chiefs with Our Signs.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:76: When the Truth did come to them from Us, they said: "This is indeed evident sorcery!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:77: Said Moses: "Say ye (this) about the truth when it hath (actually) reached you? Is sorcery (like) this? But sorcerers will not prosper.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:78: They said: "Hast thou come to us to turn us away from the ways we found our fathers following,- in order that thou and thy brother may have greatness in the land? But not we shall believe in you!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:79: Said Pharaoh: "Bring me every sorcerer well versed.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:80: When the sorcerers came, Moses said to them: "Throw ye what ye (wish) to throw!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:81: When they had had their throw, Moses said: "What ye have brought is sorcery: God will surely make it of no effect: for God prospereth not the work of those who make mischief.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:82: "And God by His words doth prove and establish His truth, however much the sinners may hate it!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:83: But none believed in Moses except some children of his people, because of the fear of Pharaoh and his chiefs, lest they should persecute them; and certainly Pharaoh was mighty on the earth and one who transgressed all bounds.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:84: Moses said: "O my people! If ye do (really) believe in God, then in Him put your trust if ye submit (your will to His).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:85: They said: "In God do we put out trust.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:86: "And deliver us by Thy Mercy from those who reject (Thee).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 10:87: We inspired Moses and his brother with this Message: "Provide dwellings for your people in Egypt, make your dwellings into places of worship, and establish regular prayers: and give glad tidings to those who believe!"
